title: Which Hindi song is hard to learn? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hey Devika.. Thanks for asking this question. If you are from Hindi speaking state then no song is hard to learn. But if you are from any state where Hindi is secondary language then it is little hard to learn a song. But I know Hindi songs which have beautiful words are very easy to learn. I hope you will find a good Hindi song for learning. Thank you and enjoy your learning.
